name: DanceBot
description:
A chaotic, bot spamming, beat-infused game, made in 3 hours for Trijam #84!

Use Arrow Keys and WAS to plan your movements in time to the music, 8 beats behind! (The D-key doesn't work (we ran outta time))

You summon a DanceBot on the golden tile, and it repeats your 8 previous presses.

Moving bots are invincible, but stationary ones break on impact.

Strategically or chaotically block and run over the enemy bots!

Reload to restart!

Art by spooces.juice on Instagram, made in 3 hours specifically for this game!

Song "Exosphere" by Creo: https://youtu.be/MN8xH1J-Jyg
